# export(to:)

**Instance Method**

Exports this transformer as a CoreML model package.

## Declaration

```swift
func export(to url: URL) throws
```

## Parameters

- **url**: The location to write the model into.

## Exporting the model

- **export(to:metadata:)**: Exports this transformer as a CoreML model package with user-supplied metadata.
